page.title: 14A Nursery School in Bradley
page.content: Parents often take their children to Nursery school so that they can go out to work.Many also take them so that the children can enjoy themselves and mix with other young children.We went to visit the Nursery school in Bradley.It is held in part of an old farmhouse.Two rooms are used by the children,one upstairs and one on the ground floor,they also go out in the garden.The children stay for dinner. In the morning they learn about numbers and play with dressing-up clothes, dolls.plasticine and jig-saw puzzles They have a Wendy House,a slide, a climbing frame,3 swings and they sometimes play with sand.In the aftenoon they paint,colour,make models or play outside.Their parents fetch them at 3 o'clock.Thirty children attend the nursery and they are looked after by four adults.The chlidren pay
